name: OCKDetailedContactViewSynchronizer
desc: A view synchronizer that creates and updates a detailed contact view.

items.name: func makeView() -> OCKDetailedContactView
items.desc: Creates a view to be synchronized.

items.name: func updateView(OCKDetailedContactView, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<OCKAnyContact?>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
